title: Litro Gas summoned before COPE tomorrow
body_lines: The management of Litro Gas Lanka Ltd has been summoned before the Committee on Public Enterprises (COPE) tomorrow at 11.00 am to inquire into the current gas shortage and related solutions.
Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe instructed to summon the Litro Gas before the COPE tomorrow. (Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
